question_In_what_year_was_a_fixation_of_: In what year was a fixation of the performance published or communicated to the public?
hint_In_what_year_was_a_fixation_of_the_: DISCLAIMER: In relation to neighbouring or related rights (i.e. rights over performances, phonograms, the first fixation of a film and broadcast) the Public Domain Calculator only applies when at least one of the right-holders is a national of an EEA state. The European Economic Area (EEA) includes all member states of the European Union (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom), as well as Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.

question_In_what_year_was_the_database_c: In what year was the database completed or last substantially changed?
hint_In_what_year_was_the_database_compl: Unoriginal databases are databases which show that there has been qualitatively and/or quantitatively a substantial investment in either the obtaining, verification or presentation of their contents. By contrast, original databases should be considered to be databases which, by reason of the selection or arrangement of their contents, constitute the author's own intellectual creation. For the purposes of this Calculator, original databases should be considered to be literary or artistic works.
question_In_what_year_was_the_database_m: In what year was the database made available to the public?
hint_In_what_year_was_the_database_made_: Unoriginal databases are databases which show that there has been qualitatively and/or quantitatively a substantial investment in either the obtaining, verification or presentation of their contents. By contrast, original databases should be considered to be databases which, by reason of the selection or arrangement of their contents, constitute the author's own intellectual creation. For the purposes of this Calculator, original databases should be considered to be literary or artistic works.

question_What_type_of_work_is_it: What type of work is it?
hint_What_type_of_work_is_it: The category "other" includes literary works, artistic works, musical works, dramatic or dramatico-musical works, works relative to science, derivative works, or collections which by reason of selection and arrangement of their contents constitute intellectual creations.
What_type_of_work_is_it: What type of work is it?
question_What_type_of_author_does_this_w: What type of author does this work have?
hint_What_type_of_author_does_this_work_: For the purposes of this Calculator, 1. If a work, such as an encyclopaedia or a periodical publication, is created on the initiative and under the direction of a publisher or producer (collective work), the publisher or producer should be deemed to be the author. The maker of each constituent part should be considered the author of that part. 2. If a work, such as an album of painting or a cookbook, is a compilation, the compiler should be deemed to be the author. The maker of each constituent part should be considered to be the author of that part. 3. If a work has been created by two or more persons in joint creative endeavour, irrespective of whether the contributions of the co-authors are inseparable or not (work of joint authorship), all contributors should be considered to be joint co-authors.
What_type_of_author_does_this_work_have: What type of author does this work have?

LBL_78: The Rule of Shorter Term (Comparison of Terms) applies. This means that the term of protection is that established by the legislation of the selected country, unless (barring provisions to the contrary in the legislation of that country) the term fixed in the country of origin of the work is shorter. In such cases, the term of protection is that of the country of origin.
